channel.title: Changing IP in Dementhium client [639]
channel.description:
Hello, title says it all..
Every single time when I try to portforward a server, there is always something to stop me, and I tried every single last step, i've changed the ip in the run.bat file for the client, i've changed the ip even in runclient.java, and I get error js5connect from cmd from running the client.
IF POSSIBLE, could somebody teamview me, or help me with this problem, and show me how to prevent this from happening in the future.
